original_text: Then he brought them up into his house and set food before them. And he rejoiced along with his entire household that he had believed in God.
korean_text: 그들을 데리고 자기 집에 올라가서 음식을 차려 주고 그와 온 집안이 하나님을 믿으므로 크게 기뻐하니라

sentences.original_text: Then he brought them up into his house
And he rejoiced along with his entire household
that he had believed in God
